entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with 30 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
